title: "00-Data-Preprocessing"
output: html_notebook
---

In this notebook we read and preprocess the raw data.

Read packages used:
```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
```

Read source file:
```{r}

Santiago2016 <- read_excel("Santiago2016.xlsx")
```

Rename:
```{r}
Santiago2016 <- Santiago2016 %>%
  rename(ID = NUMERO)
```

Split table:
```{r}
Santiago2016_r0 <- Santiago2016 %>%
  dplyr::select(ID, ORIGIN, starts_with("r0"))
```

```{r}
Santiago2016_allelse <- Santiago2016 %>%
  dplyr::select(-starts_with("r0"))
```

Save  to `data` folder:
```{r}
usethis::use_data(Santiago2016, 
                  overwrite = TRUE)

usethis::use_data(Santiago2016_r0, 
                  overwrite = TRUE)

usethis::use_data(Santiago2016_allelse, 
                  overwrite = TRUE)
```
